title: YouTube Sues, Elon Tweets, and Apple Has Battery Problems
description:
This week's episode of Waveform quickly recaps some feedback and videos we love, before diving into a few big headlines including YouTube taking on copyright abuse, Elon Musk wanting to nuke Mars, and Apple having a few issues in the battery department. After all that, we take a few listener questions to wrap everything up. Enjoy! 
Episode sponsored by 1Password: https://1password.com/mkbhd/

Don't forget to follow us at: https://twitter.com/wvfrm 
Original Music by Kamren Barlow: https://bit.ly/2ZaLddo 
Links discussed in the episode: 

MrWhosetheboss Smartphone Fails: https://bit.ly/30lOlj3 
Sam Sheffer Deadmau5 Tour: https://bit.ly/2L5qygG 
Samsung's iMessage gifs: https://bit.ly/2ZfJHG7 
Louis Rossman on 3rd party batteries: https://bit.ly/33TdZhp 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
